mapper.select: select community.comm_num, community.comm_content, TO_CHAR(community.comm_date,'yyyy-MM-DD') comm_date, community.club_num, community.member_num, member.member_name FROM community -- inner join member on community.club_num = member.club_num inner join member on community.member_num = member.member_num WHERE member.club_num = #{clubNum}
